channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: My Floating Home
channel.desc: Londoners Lily and Natasha have bought a decrepit narrowboat at a knock-down price. Will their DIY enthusiasm override their lack of experience.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Charlie and Lee are in Warrington to transform Bindu and Vivek's first garden into a productive, eco-friendly retreat.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Love Your Garden
channel.desc: Alan Titchmarsh and his team of gardening experts surprise a fellow landscape gardener with Alzheimer's by building a modern family garden.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Highclere
channel.desc: The castle transforms into a magical winter wonderland, as the team wrestle their biggest-ever tree and butler Louis gets very merry hosting a cocktail making master class. Last in series.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Real Thick Glasses
channel.desc: Solomon Watkins' quirky take as he interviews Michael, owner of the world's most unique collection of Really Thick Glasses. Funded and supported by Together TV and Cat Flap Media.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: School for Sex
channel.desc: Carry On-style comedy curio. A divorced man teaches girls how to swindle rich men - and in return he gets a cut of their takings. Contains nudity and 60s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: House of Whipcord
channel.desc: A young model is lured to a secluded prison where a sadistic matron punishes women for perceived moral failings. Contains nudity and distressing scenes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: My Floating Home
channel.desc: Londoners Lily and Natasha have bought a decrepit narrowboat at a knock-down price. Will their DIY enthusiasm override their lack of experience.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Stuart Farm
channel.desc: 5 / 12. Archaeologists and historians run a farm for a year as it would have been in King James I's reign. January sees them resort to period medicines to beat aches and pains.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Edwardian Farm
channel.desc: It is July and the team face their busiest month so far. Historian Ruth Goodman tries her hand at salmon netting, and there is a rare opportunity for a day away from the farm.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Flo and Lee are in Southampton to transform an awkwardly shaped plot into a Cypriot-styled paradise for Angus.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Hello Campers
channel.desc: Relive the glory days of good clean Hi-De-Hi style fun with this oral history of Britain's holiday camps. Hello Campers.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Richard Wilson's Highland Fling
channel.desc: Richard returns to Scotland to embark on tour of the Highlands and Islands. The journey offers him the opportunity to discover more about his homeland and reflect on his life.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Gloves Off
channel.desc: British boxing comedy. Following his trainer's sudden death, Doug inherits a crumbling gym, packed full of crazy would-be fighters. Stars Brad Moore and Denise Van Outen.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Futtock's End
channel.desc: Ronnie Barker stars as General Futtock, who has a motley group of guests stay at his country estate - and chaos ensues. Contains 70s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: My Floating Home
channel.desc: In Surrey, Linda and Mark need an upgrade on their cramped floating home and Linda's doing it by herself. Is passion enough to get the job done.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: My Floating Home
channel.desc: In Kent, metal worker John tackles a cut-price riverboat restoration using ingenious workarounds. Can he make a home of his own.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: My Floating Home
channel.desc: After 25 years living in New Zealand, Keith and Pam dream of touring the UK's waterways. But it's their first boat and they'll need to learn the ropes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Highclere
channel.desc: The team prepare for their first charity gala in three years in the castle's iconic library, with some clay pigeon shooting, a three-course lunch and a big-ticket auction.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Highclere
channel.desc: The team mark the centenary of the 5th Earl of Carnarvon's discovery of Tutankhamen's tomb, and prepare for the biggest event of the summer - the Battle Proms.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Musketeer
channel.desc: Kevin McNally stars as Porthos, one of the Three Musketeers, in this award-winning short drama.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: I'm Not Feeling Myself Tonight
channel.desc: Hapless Jon Pigeon works in a sex research institute. To seduce a colleague, he invents an aphrodisiac-emitter machine turning any man or woman into a horny fiend. Contains nudity.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Au Pair Girls
channel.desc: Seventies film following the misadventures of four female au pairs who arrive at Heathrow Airport and are whisked off to work for different families. Contains sexual scenes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Girl on a Motorcycle
channel.desc: This sixties cult classic sees a married woman leaving her husband, riding off on her prized motorbike to visit her lover. The late, great Marianne Faithful stars. Contains nudity.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Weekend Millionaires
channel.desc: An oral history of Britain's most famous river; focusing on the Lightermen and Watermen who have worked on the Thames from the 1960s to today.

channel.desc: The team mark the centenary of the 5th Earl of Carnarvon's discovery of Tutankhamen's tomb, and prepare for the biggest event of the summer - the Battle Proms.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: What's Good For The Goose
channel.desc: Comedy. Norman Wisdom stars as a bank manager who upends his square existence to join some youthful hippies. Will this new groovy energy bring the spark back to his marriage.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: The Odd Job
channel.desc: Comedy. A despondent man hires a professional assassin to take himself out. Stars David Jason and Monty Python's Graham Chapman.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Commandos
channel.desc: Action. World War II. Allied commandos are parachuted into North Africa on a mission to infiltrate and hold an Axis-held fort until reinforcements arrive. Lee Van Cleef stars.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Skyfire
channel.desc: Action. Tianhuo Island is paradise in the Pacific. Such a shame it's located in the Ring of Fire, a world-famous volcanic belt. Guess what happens. Jason Isaacs stars.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Sex With The Stars
channel.desc: A shy astrology columnist is ordered to spice up his column by having affairs with a woman from each star sign then writing about it. Contains sex scenes and 80s social attitudes.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Cruel Passion
channel.desc: A young orphan girl Justine falls into a world of cruel depravity while her sister Juliette thrives in vice. Adaptation of de Sade's novel. Contains distressing scenes and nudity.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: Die Screaming Marianne
channel.desc: Marianne, a nightclub dancer, is on the run from vicious criminals. Trickery and betrayal are around every corner in this suspense-filled thriller. Susan George stars.

channel.name: Together TV UK
channel.title: In The Spotlight
channel.desc: Exploring the working lives of musicians working in London's West End from 1950s Soho, jazz clubs and theatre up to the present day.
